trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, right-click the project, click **Publish** > **Microsoft Azure Mobile Services**.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, right-click the project, click **Publish** > **Microsoft Azure Mobile Services**.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using Visual Studio, [you may also use Git](../articles/mobile-services/mobile-services-dotnet-backend-store-code-source-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Instead of using Visual Studio, [you may also use Git](../articles/mobile-services/mobile-services-dotnet-backend-store-code-source-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Sign in with Azure credentials and select your service from **Existing Mobile Services**.
trans-unit.target: Sign in with Azure credentials and select your service from **Existing Mobile Services**.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio downloads your publish settings directly from Azure.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio downloads your publish settings directly from Azure.
